Name: Explaining GNN with High-Level Concepts
Description: Developed a pipeline to process heterogeneous graph data.
Integrated LLM-based concept extraction into domain ontology.
Trained and explained Graph Neural Networks for improved interpretability.

Name: Movie Platform
Description: Built IMDb-like platform for browsing movies, actors, and directors.
Implemented secure JWT authentication and TMDB API integration.
Developed responsive UI with search, filters, and reviews.

Name: Food Blogging Website
Description: Created a recipe-sharing platform with user interaction features.
Implemented backend in PHP and MySQL, frontend in HTML/CSS.

Name: Sundial Emulator
Description: Developed a sundial simulation tool based on user’s longitude.
Used OpenGL to render accurate 3D sundial visualizations.
